Name: Save the World? Save the Cat!
Description: The cat of the restaurant owner Xiaoju has not returned. Please help find the naughty cat and bring it back to its owner.
QuestDesc: The cat of the restaurant owner Xiaoju has not returned. Please help find the naughty cat and bring it back to its owner.

Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Strange. Where did he run off to...?
I'm looking for my cat Lulu. He likes to wander off a lot, but usually not very far away.
I need to head out to the city to stock up on some supplies, but I'm worried about leaving him out there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh. Where are my manners? I'm Xiaoju, the owner of this here restaurant.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Are you here for a bite to eat? Sorry, but we're not open for the day yet.

Options.PlotLineKey: How about I go look for Lulu while you're gone?
I just saw Lulu not long ago.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, you mean it? That's great!

Options.PlotLineKey: I'll bring him back for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh! Lulu... Thank goodness you're home. Come give Mommy some kisses! Mwah! Mwah!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why didn't you answer to Mommy earlier? Hmm? If you don't come home next time, I'll just tie Lulu up to Mommy. Got it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: When I'm happy, I'll take out Lulu for some kisses. And when I'm having a bad time, I'll use Lulu for a snuggle. How does that sound?

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Like this. A few kisses here... Mwah, mwah... And another kiss there... Mwwaaah!

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, I'm sorry, I lost myself there for a moment...

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't be afraid. It's just... how I show my love for cats, that's all.

Options.PlotLineKey: I see... I can see where you're coming from.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, really?! I was worried that I gave you a startle, hehe... From now on, you're welcome to visit and play with Lulu any time you want! You can give me some kisses if you want. Here! He likes you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Xiaoju
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, thank you so much for helping me find Lulu! I should have you and Lulu join in marriage!
